sourcesContent:
import React ,{useState,useEffect}from 'react' import { Wrapper, Container, InputsContainer, SearchBox, SearchInput, FilterSelect, FilterOption, SearchIcon, CardsContainer, CountryCard, Image, CountryTitle, CountryInfo, Info } from '../HomePage/style' import {AiOutlineSearch} from 'react-icons/ai' function HomePage(props) { const [country,setCountry] = useState({}) useEffect(() => { async function fetchCountry(){ const response = await fetch('https://restcountries.com/v3.1/name/brazil'); const data = response.json() setCountry({name : data[0].name}) } }, [setCountry]) return ( Filter by Region Africa Americas Asia Europa Oceania
{country.name.common} ) } export default HomePage
